channel.title: Ai Action Plan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ai Action Plan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ted Cruz AI bill could let firms bribe Trump to avoid safety laws, critics warn
item.description: Ted Cruz won’t give up fight to block states from regulating AI.

item.title: US government agency drops Grok after MechaHitler backlash, report says
item.description: It appears Grok’s antisemitic rants stopped it from becoming feds’ go-to chatbot.

item.title: US executive branch agencies will use ChatGPT Enterprise for just $1 per agency
item.description: Questions linger about ideological bias in models as well as data security.

item.title: States take the lead in AI regulation as federal government steers clear
item.description: All 50 states have introduced AI-related legislation this year.

item.title: Trump’s order to make chatbots anti-woke is unconstitutional, senator says
item.description: Trump plans to use chatbots to eliminate dissent, senator alleged.
